text: Morpheus is a main character of The Matrix franchise. He is portrayed by Laurence Fishburne. ==Biography== Morpheus of the Resistance wanted to find Neo by phone calls. As Neo finds him in the Matrix, Morpheus offers him to take either a red pill or a blue pill to join him into the real world. Neo took the red pill. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1999 Category:The Matrix characters
title: Morpheus (The Matrix)
